## Router.addActiveModel() method

添加激活对象

**Signature:**

```typescript
addActiveModel(moduleId: number, path: string, model: Model, field: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  moduleId | number | 模块id |
|  path | string | 路由路径 |
|  model | [Model](./nodom3.model.md) | 激活字段所在model |
|  field | string | 字段名 |
